articles.author: Edd Straw
articles.title: Perez must do more than cash in on 'big gift' from Mercedes - The Race
articles.description: Securing runner-up spot in the 2023 F1 drivers' standings now looks a lot more likely for Sergio Perez, but it's just a small part of the real fight he faces to keep his Red Bull drive in 2025. This weekend's Mexican GP will be an important marker
articles.content: Sergio Perezs bid to cap off a perfect season for Red Bull by clinching second in the Formula 1 drivers championship received a lucky boost in Austin when Lewis Hamilton was excluded, giving Perez a … [+7046 chars]
